articles.title: Irish house prices undervalued? Shows how misleading stats can be - The Irish Times
articles.description: European Commission report saying houses undervalued relies on outmoded statistics
articles.content:
Ever hear the one about the statistician who drowned in a lake, average depth 12in? Averages can be elucidating; they can also be infuriating.
